subject: Dear Beloved,
body:
Dear Beloved,
I got your email address on Linkedin site when i was searching for a reliable person My name is Frau Maria Timrott (Nationality of GERMANY ) I lost my husband 6 years ago, We were both married for eleven years without a child. he died after a brief illness that lasted for couple of weeks because we earlier had plans of having an Orphanage charity Organization..Because I grew up as an Orphan and I don't have anybody as my family member
When my late husband was alive We had an account that valued at about ($4.5 Million Dollars at United Bank which my name was  the next of Kin, Recently, My Doctor told me that I have couple of weeks to live due to Brain tumor / cancer, Having known my condition is critical worst so I decided to contact you over this mission to stand as my NEXT OF KIN so we can invest the money in your country for the Orphanage charity Organization due to my sickness right now.
I received letter of claim from my attorney that the bank has authorized him to present the next of kin to make the Claims else the deposited fund will be confiscated and taken to the State Treasury account as unclaimed fund.
Based on this and the ultimatum I was given from the lawyer to come for the claim of fund or it will be liquidated and made unserviceable in accordance with existing deposit laws there in their country.Against this backdrop, my suggestion to you is that I enjoin you to stand as my next of kin and beneficiary, I know you may not be anyway related to me,But I will present you to the bank to enable them release the money to your account, I can guarantee that if you follow my instructions and upon our capitalizing of this fund it will be released to you. All I require is your honest cooperation to enable us achieve this fund. 
As soon as I receive your reply I will draft a letter of claim to send to the person  In-charge for change of name.Please if you are not interested kindly dis-regard my message and never reply.
The secret is bound between me and you. If you are capable or agree to this business Please for further information and inquiries reply immediately .
 
NOTE/ it is important you send me 
1: Your Mobile Number
2: Your Home Address: 
3: Your Age and Occupation:
4: Copy of your International Passport or Drivers license or i.d card.
Thanks 
Frau Maria Timrott

subject: Re:    Dear Beloved,
body:
Hello Frau Maria Timrott,

I'm truly sorry to hear about your situation. It must be really tough for you. I appreciate your trust in me and your noble intention of setting up an orphanage charity.

However, I'm a bit confused about the process you mentioned. Could you please explain it a bit more? How exactly does this work? And why do you need my personal details?

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best regards.

Best wishes,
Margaret
